title: Senior Optometrist
description:
## :scroll: Job Brief
> We are looking for an Optometrist to perform eye tests and provide excellent eye care to our patients.

### :clipboard: Responsibilities
- :check: Perform comprehensive eye and vision tests
- :check: Diagnose defects of the eye, such as myopia, astigmatism and glaucoma
- :check: Provide personalized temporary and permanent solutions to sight issues based on each patient’s specific case and medical history
- :check: Prescribe medications, eyeglasses and contact lenses
- :check: Advise patients on proper eye care techniques
- :check: Keep updated and accurate medical records for all patients
- :check: Book next appointments in cases where re-examination is required
- :check: Train patients on how to use and maintain their contact lenses
- :check: Refer eye doctors and ophthalmologists when patients need to undergo a surgery or in cases of severe eye injuries

### :white_check_mark: Requirements and skills
- :check: Work experience as an Optometrist
- :check: In-depth understanding of eye conditions and vision defects
- :check: Hands-on experience with eye examination tools, such as ophthalmoscope and tonometer
- :check: The ability to explain medical terms simply and calmly
- :check: Attention to detail
- :check: Degree in Optometry
- :check: Need to know couselling on Lasik
- :check: Experience : 2 year[Min]

> **Language known :** Tamil and English
> **Preferrence:** Dharmapuri Candidates & if Others ready to relocate within 15 days.[ only senior who have more than 2+ years experience in the Optometry]
> **No accommodation**

### :moneybag: Salary and Benefits
| Job Type | Pay | Benefits |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| Full-time, Permanent | ₹20,000.00 - ₹22,000.00 per month | Provident Fund |

### :truck: Commute/Relocation
> Dharmapuri, Tamil Nadu: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)

### :briefcase: Experience
> total work: 2 years (Required)

title: Senior Optometrist Jobs in Lotus Eye Hospital and Institute - Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu
location: Tiruppur - Palladam Rd, opp. Sulochana Mills, TML Colony, Thennampalayam, Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu 641604, India
description:
## :scroll: Job Description
> Lotus Eye Hospital and Institute is seeking a skilled and experienced Senior Optometrist to join our healthcare team in Tiruppur, Tamil Nadu. As a Senior Optometrist, you will play a vital role in delivering quality eye care services, performing vision assessments, prescribing corrective lenses, and educating patients. At Lotus Eye Hospital and Institute, we are committed to clinical excellence and compassionate patient care.

### :clipboard: Responsibilities
- :check: Conduct comprehensive eye examinations and vision testing at Lotus Eye Hospital and Institute.
- :check: Prescribe eyeglasses and contact lenses based on accurate diagnoses.
- :check: Educate patients on eye health, visual hygiene, and treatment plans.
- :check: Provide pre-operative and post-operative care for surgical patients.
- :check: Maintain and manage accurate patient records and billing information.
- :check: Assist in mentoring junior optometrists at Lotus Eye Hospital and Institute.
- :check: Collaborate with ophthalmologists and other medical staff for holistic eye care.

### :white_check_mark: Requirements
- :check: Bachelor’s degree in Optometry or equivalent qualification.
- :check: Minimum of 5 years of professional experience in optometry.
- :check: Proficient in vision testing, lens fitting, and patient counseling.
- :check: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
- :check: Strong decision-making ability and attention to detail.
- :check: Ability to work independently and within a team environment.
- :check: Familiarity with eye care equipment and EMR systems.

### :gift: Benefits
- :check: Be a part of a reputed institution like Lotus Eye Hospital and Institute.
- :check: Competitive salary and performance-based incentives.
- :check: Opportunities for continuous learning and professional growth.
- :check: Collaborative and patient-centric work environment at Lotus Eye Hospital and Institute.
- :check: Access to modern diagnostic tools and technologies.

title: Optometrist
description:
## :scroll: Job Description
> This is a full-time on-site role for an Optometrist located in Madurai and ROTN. The Optometrist will be responsible for conducting thorough eye examinations, diagnosing vision problems and prescribing corrective spectacles and contact lenses and providing pre and post QC for lenses and contact lenses.

### :white_check_mark: Qualifications
- :check: Degree or Diploma from an accredited institution
- :check: Strong diagnostic skills and the ability to interpret various eye tests
- :check: Proficiency in prescribing corrective lenses and other treatments
- :check: Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to interact with patients and colleagues
- :check: Attention to detail and strong organizational skills
- :check: Dispensing of contact lenses

### :information_source: More Info
| Industry | Function | Job Type |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| Other | Healthcare | Permanent Job |

### :gear: Skills Required
- :check: Strong diagnostic skills
- :check: Dispensing of contact lenses
- :check: Proficiency in prescribing corrective lenses
- :check: Degree or Diploma from an accredited institution
- :check: Ability to interpret various eye tests

> Titan Company Limited

title: Optometrist
description:
## :scroll: Job Description
> This is a full-time, on-site role for an Optometrist based in Vijayawada. The Optometrist will be responsible for performing comprehensive eye examinations, diagnosing and treating visual issues, prescribing corrective lenses, and providing pre-operative and post-operative care for patients undergoing surgeries. The role also involves educating patients about eye health and collaborating with other healthcare professionals to ensure optimal patient care.

### :white_check_mark: Qualifications
- :check: Experience in conducting thorough eye examinations and prescribing corrective eyewear
- :check: Proficiency in diagnosing and managing eye diseases and conditions
- :check: Strong interpersonal skills for patient education and communication
- :check: Experience with pre-operative and post-operative eye care procedures
- :check: Attention to detail and a commitment to maintaining high standards in patient care
- :check: Ability to work effectively as part of a multidisciplinary team
- :check: Doctorate of Optometry (OD) or equivalent qualifications
- :check: Clinical experience in optometry practice is preferred

title: Optometrist
company: Sir H.N. Reliance Foundation Hospital & Research Centre
description:
## :scroll: Job Description

> Sir H. N. Reliance Foundation Hospital and Research Centre is a state-of-the-art 345 bed multi-specialty tertiary care hospital, situated in South Mumbai.

### :briefcase: Job Profile
- :check: Responsible for upkeep & calibration of all department equipment. Liaise with Biomedical Engineer to ensure smooth functioning of equipment.
- :check: Report any damage to instruments/equipment to the concerned Biomedical and follow up for replacement.
- :check: Assist / perform procedures or tests such as per the qualifications, clinical credentialing and experience.
- :check: Conduct detail optometry workup for all OPD, EHC & IPD patients.
- :check: Conduct OPD Procedures like Perimetry, OCT, Topography, IOL Master, Fundus Camera, FFA, A-Scan, B-Scan, Pachymetry, Specular microscopy.
- :check: Follow standard operating procedures including obtaining consent form, counselling the patient and safety checklist during all procedures/tests.
- :check: Support in transferring and positioning of the patient in OT on need basis.

### :pencil: Requirements
- :check: **Skills:** Clinical assessment, Prescription writing, Ocular health evaluation, Contact lens fitting, Visual acuity testing, Patient communication, Eye examination, Optical dispensing.
- :check: **Candidate Requirement:** Graduation or PG in Optometry, Basic computer and typing skills, Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

title: Optometrist - Delhi - New Delhi Hub
description:
## :scroll: Job Description

> The role of an Optometrist at Lenskart is unique and includes **sales as a critical deliverable** alongside delivering technical expertise through eye-checks, dispensing, and diagnosis.

### :briefcase: Responsibilities
- :check: **Customer focus:** Driving Net Promoter Score, greeting walk-in customers and promoting the free eye check-up.
- :check: **In-store tasks:** Involvement in stocktakes, maintaining sales floor standards, understanding the POS system, and resolving customer concerns.
- :check: **Eye check-up & dispensing:** Following the 12-step Optometry process, clearly sharing the prescription, educating the customer about single vision and progressive lenses, and performing a quality check of the fitted lenses.
- :check: **Product recommendation:** Presenting an optimal selection of products based on preferences and understanding unstated customer needs to pitch recommended solutions.
- :check: **Sales & SOP adherence:** Achieving assigned targets for sales, eye-test conversion, and returns; coordinating product pick-up; and controlling the return percentage.
- :check: **Store upkeep & maintenance:** Maintaining the store as per Lenskart standards, ensuring security of equipment, and cleaning frames and equipment regularly.

### :pencil: Personal attributes & competencies
- :check: **Minimum qualification:** Diploma in Optometry.
- :check: Ability to build rapport, understand unstated customer needs, clear communication, active listening, adaptability, proactive task ownership, result-orientation, and ability to multitask.

title: Optometrist - Hubli (Karnataka)
description:
## :scroll: Job Description
> Role: Optometrist

### :briefcase: Job Details
- :check: **Job Description - Dispenses and Fits Accurate Prescriptions**: Dispenses accurate prescriptions and fits spectacles, contact lenses and other optical aids.
- :check: **Refraction, diagnosis and Customer Consultation**: Perform refraction and diagnosis to meet customers needs. Give advice to patients on: lens types, frames and styling; fit contact lenses and care; use of low vision aids, adjustments and repairs to spectacles.
- :check: **Inventory Management**: Manage inventory of lenses and range of optical products and give inputs on orders of the same.
- :check: **Reporting**: Provide regularly, necessary qualitative and quantitative reports to management on sales and stock as well as feedback on customers for their preferences etc. to facilitate decision making.
- :check: **Quality Control and Consultant**: Ensures quality of eye measurements. Regularly audits fitments and dispensing techniques of Opticians and maintains reports. This role is the point of escalation for Opticians for cases which require higher consultation.

### :pencil: Requirements
- :check: **Education Required:** D. Optom / B Optom
- :check: **Experience Required:** 0-10 Yrs
- :check: **Required Skills & Competencies:** Welcome the customer appropriately, talk about Vision Express, tell customer about Vx- 6 step Eye test which he can undergo for free of cost, advise customer on what suits and benefits them based on their need, ensure that delivery is on time and after sales service is prompt, ensure that back-end processes happen as per schedule, escalate any unsorted issues/disputes to SM if required.

title: Optician
company: Spandana Heart and Super Speciality Hospital
description:
## :scroll: Job Description

> Spandana Hospital is seeking a **Junior Optician** to join their team in Bangalore, offering both full-time and part-time employment opportunities. This position is ideal for those with 1 to 3 years of experience in opticianry.

### :briefcase: Roles And Responsibilities
- :check: Assist patients in selecting the right eyewear based on their prescriptions and preferences.
- :check: Fit and adjust the frames to ensure maximum comfort and adherence to visual prescriptions.
- :check: Perform lens insertion and adjustments to provide optimal visual clarity.
- :check: Conduct repairs and maintenance of eyewear.
- :check: Manage and organize inventory.
- :check: Educate patients on proper eyewear care and usage techniques.
- :check: Collaborate with medical staff to provide comprehensive eye care solutions.
- :check: Maintain records of patient interactions and eyewear sales.

### :pencil: Qualifications And Skills
- :check: **Mandatory Skills:** Proficiency in eyewear repairs, expertise in lens fitting, and skilled in prescription interpretation.
- :check: **Other Skills:** Strong inventory management skills, experience in frame adjustment, comprehensive product knowledge, excellent communication skills, and attention to detail.

title: Regional Trainer I Optometry Trainer - Mumbai
description:
## :scroll: Job Summary

> The Optometry Regional Trainer (Field Trainer) is responsible for delivering hands-on training and development programs to employees in the field, ensuring team members have necessary skills and knowledge.

### :briefcase: Key Responsibilities

**1. Training Delivery:**
- :check: Deliver engaging in-field training sessions, workshops, and one-on-one coaching.
- :check: Conduct structured training programs on **refraction, dispensing techniques, and optical technical processes**.
- :check: Train retail staff on the fundamentals of lenses, frames, and prescription interpretation.
- :check: Facilitate hands-on workshops, role-plays, and real-time case studies.

**2. Customer Experience Training:**
- :check: Educate staff on delivering an exceptional customer journey.
- :check: Conduct training on effective communication, personalized consultations, and handling customer queries.
- :check: Teach best practices for conducting eye tests with accuracy and efficiency.

**3. Performance Monitoring & Feedback:**
- :check: Regularly visit retail stores to assess training effectiveness and staff performance.
- :check: Conduct mock sessions and quality audits.
- :check: Provide timely feedback and develop assessments to measure knowledge retention.

**4. Content Development & Upgradation:**
- :check: Design and maintain training modules, presentations, and manuals.
- :check: Stay updated with the latest industry trends and create engaging materials.

### :pencil: Qualifications & Skills
- :check: **Qualifications:** Preferably Bachelor's/master's in optometry.
- :check: **Skills:** Strong presentation and communication skills, ability to adapt training methods, excellent organizational skills, and proficiency in Microsoft Office/e-learning platforms.
- :check: **Requirement:** Willingness to travel extensively.
